name: Neuro-Lace
description: A fine mesh of conductive polymers and nanites woven into hair follicles. When activated, it allows the user to directly interface with electronic devices through their nervous system.

flavor.rationale: Developed by a now-defunct megacorp as an experimental accessibility tool for the disabled, Neuro-Lace ended up in the black market after its creator died under mysterious circumstances. It's highly sought after among hackers and netrunners who value direct connection to machines over slower, more secure interfaces.
